formattedAddress: 263 W 38th St #7, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 263 W 38th St #7, New York, NY 10018-0289, USA

originalText.text: I'm a huge fan of Brian and the team at Lloyd Group.  They listen first, give great technology advice and solve pesky IT problems with grace.  I'd highly recommend their work.

text.text: I'm a huge fan of Brian and the team at Lloyd Group.  They listen first, give great technology advice and solve pesky IT problems with grace.  I'd highly recommend their work.

originalText.text:
Lloyd Group set up Proofpoint Essentials as a mail relay/spam filter for my company.   Proofpoint was horrible and it seems that if I notify Lloyd Group about Proofpoints delays and undelivered emails I am billed $155/hr.  Nice.    I am telling them that the product they sold me is NOT working the way it's supposed to.  Neither Lloyd Group or Proofpoint do anything like proactively notify me of issues.  If anything, i should be billing THEM for MY time.

Very frustrating company to deal with.   Avoid at all costs

Edit   March 29, 2017
It is unfortunate that it took a negative review to get credited for things that I never should have been billed for in the first place.

Needless to say I moved my service to a different vendor.
I will raise my review a tad as they took the time to reply to me and give me a refund.

originalText.text: Excellent salads and pizza, reasonable prices.

text.text: Excellent salads and pizza, reasonable prices.
